name: Platformer (Challenge Edition)
description:
This model game is featured within my Udemy course: Intro to Construct 3 - Build a Platformer.  The course is a project-based introduction to Game Design, featuring the Construct 3 game engine.

This is an example of what you can build while learning the fundamentals of 2D game development with Construct 3.  You can even play it on the go from your favorite mobile device, so check out the touch controls too!

A valid Construct 3 license is required to complete the course.

This course features freely-available assets, mostly from, your hero and mine, Kenney a.k.a. "Asset Jesus".
